title: Zion Williamson, Kawhi Leonard, rivalries, and the Lakers
itunes:title: Zion Williamson, Kawhi Leonard, rivalries, and the Lakers
description:
Colin defends Zion Williamson and doubles down on why he will be a star. He's not sure on where Kawhi Leonard will land while feeling bad for the Los Angeles Clippers. Colin also doesn't mind the Tom Brady-Peyton Manning friendship and breaks down the breaking news for the Los Angeles Lakers. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Rob Parker, Chris Haynes, and Ian Bagley.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
